text: Meng Wanzhou (; born February 13, 1972; also known as Cathy Meng and Sabrina Meng) is a Chinese business executive. She is the deputy chair of the board and chief financial officer (CFO) of telecom giant and China's largest privately held company, Huawei, founded by her father Ren Zhengfei. In December 2018, she was arrested in Vancouver, Canada for fraud charges. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Politics of the People's Republic of China
title: Meng Wanzhou
